channel.title: Os x and whonix
channel.description:
Hello !
Im totall noob :) but i need an advice. Can i instal two operating systems on my macbok ? I know about installing windows and mac but how about mac os x and whonix ? What i want is to choose between os x and whonix on startup screen. Is that possible ? And if yes what i need to do/install etc. Thanx very much for help !

item.title: Os x and whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Optionâ€¦

a)
You should be able to run VirtualBox on top of MacOS. Then import Whonix VMs.

b)
Dual boot Debian, where you install VIrtualBox on top and import Whonix, would be more secure, but also harder to set up. In order to accomplish dual boot, I advise to check MacOS specific instructions and community on that topic.

Read full topic
